messages.title: Why I am backing Chris Jones
messages.content: We need people like Chris in Parliament - people who've worked in the real world and know what life is like outside the Westminster bubble. I know Chris has a real passion for mental health and a commitment to our public services - he'll be a great representative for the people of Norwich North. Dave Rowntree, Norfolk resident and drummer with Blur

keyPolicies.policyTitle: End creeping privatisation of our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Private companies are siphoning profits out of our NHS spending, then pulling out of contracts and abandoning patients when the going gets tough. Billions are spent on contracting and tendering instead of on patient care. We need to return to the principles the NHS was built on.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Education for all not favouritism for a few
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I want to state comprehensive and I believe in excellent education for all - not just for the select few. Tory plans for Grammar Schools really mean Secondary Moderns for 90% of children - our kids deserve better. I will back local headteachers calling for cuts to be reversed.

Since 2010 crime has risen while police budgets have been cut. We need more Police Officers. I prefer rehabilitation for offenders - especially for mental disorder and substance abuse - and restorative justice that puts victims first.

issues.education: I believe in excellent education for all - not just for the select few. Tory plans for Grammar Schools really mean Secondary Moderns for 90% of children - our kids deserve better.

community.content: I prefer rehabilitation for offenders - especially for mental disorder and substance abuse - and restorative justice that puts victims first.

leaflet.personalStatement:
For over 30 years I've been an NHS doctor. Now I'm standing for election to continue that commitment to helping the most vulnerable in our community.
As a consultant psychiatrist I've worked with people from all backgrounds and in all sorts of circumstances, and I know how illness and misfortune can affect any of us. This government has targeted the most vulnerable and disadvantaged with savage cuts while rewarding the wealthiest with tax breaks.
I believe in a different approach - a society and an economy that works for all and that shares our prosperity fairly. Please support me and help us to achieve it.
Dr Chris Jones

contactInformation.address: St Mark's Church Hall, Hall Road, Norwich NR1 3HL
